testsuite.name: automationexerciseshoping.LoginFunctionality
testsuite.system-out: Starting negative login test with invalid password... Navigated to the automation exercise website. Clicked on 'Signup / Login' button. Entered valid email address. Entered invalid password. Clicked on the 'Login' button. Login failed as expected. Error message is displayed.

Starting positive login test... Navigated to the automation exercise website. Clicked on 'Signup / Login' button. Entered valid email address. Entered valid password. Clicked on the 'Login' button. Login successful, 'Logout' button is visible. Clicked on 'Logout' button.

Starting negative login test with invalid email... Navigated to the automation exercise website. Clicked on 'Signup / Login' button. Entered invalid email address. Entered valid password. Clicked on the 'Login' button. Login failed as expected. Error message is displayed.
